TopicTitle: Where's the rest of the UI?

Articles.Content: There's no transfer calculator/timer, no advanced orbit info (inclination, eccentricity, etc.), and no way to rename/retag our vessels. Is there a plan to add these? The lack of a transfer calculator is especially annoying.

We're in the first stage of early access. Give it time. After all, KSP1 got most of the tools near the end of its support, *years* after modders did it. Considering we need most of those to even begin planning colonies, that needs to come out a little sooner.

Yes, answered in the last AMA:

On 6/30/2023 at 3:00 AM, Dakota said:

Currently the UI for the game makes it very hard to use the navball and to plan anything other than very close maneuvers, will we get similar features to KSP 1 in the future (such as a maneuver panel, approach panel, etc)? (WhamyKaBlamy, Steam)

Quote

Yes, yes. So yes, we do expect to add, fine maneuver controls prior to 1.0. We definitely recognize there's lots of room for improvements when it comes to kind of trip planning and maneuver creation and maneuver editing. And so they are definitely priorities for us

And the renaming of craft is a bug being fixed:
I'm prob going to be a bit weird her but I'd be cool with just a note pad type area where I can state goals and info about the craft.
